name: Cube Slide
description:
Cube Slide is inspired by the arcade games Ketchapp, the mobile game developer, makes. You are a red cube going around and dodging obstacles.  For my take on Versatile Verbs, I added a forward speed boost when you hold down the control key and the W key. This game was made for Linux Game Jam 2018, therefore it only has a Linux variant for now

You can find the code on my Github.

Thanks for checking this out and it would be much appreciated if you could donate.
